title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, April 30, 2014
description: On today's show, a closer look at the competition between AT&T and other telecoms as the rules for in-flight digital usage are relaxed, and the FCC frees up more wireless spectrum. Also, Bethany Mota, host of a Youtube channel with almost 6 million subscribers, talks about making videos for teenagers and internet stardom. Plus, more on the debut of Amazon.com's wearable technology store.
